function gcd(a, b) result(res)
    integer, intent(in) :: a, b
    integer :: res, a_in, b_in, r
    a_in = a
    b_in = b

    if (b_in > a_in) then
        tmp = a_in
        a_in = b_in
        b_in = tmp ! Use a_in and b_in
    end if

    if (b_in == 0) then
        res = a_in
        return
    end if

    r = -1 

    do while (r /=0)
        r = mod(a_in, b_in)
        a_in = b_in
        b_in = r
    end do

    res = a_in
ends function

program atcoder
    implicit none
    integer :: N, i, answer
    integer, dimension(:), allocatable :: A, L, R

        answer = max(answer, gcd( L(i-1), R(i+1) ) )
    end do 

    ! Print the answer
    print*, answer

    ! Deallocate memory
    deallocate( A, L, R )

contains 

    ! Function to compute GCD.
    integer function gcd(a, b)
        integer, intent(in) :: a, b
        integer :: a1, b1, r

        a1 = a
        b1 = b
        if ( b1 == 0 ) then
            gcd = a1
            return
        end if

        do while ( b1 /= 0 )
            r = mod(a1, b1)
            a1 = b1
            b1 = r
        end do
        gcd = a1
    end function 

end program atcoder
